comments:
I20050412-1547

Tons of NPEs (see below) are written to .log and the Synchronize view is empty
on each startup . The pinned sessions were still available in the drop down but
no state. "Show Change Sets" is enabled.

Workaround: close and reopen the Synchronize view.

Michael, can you provide a new version of the corresponding plug-in? This bug
happens more often than just on restart. Sometimes when saving a file the view
gets empty again.

Created an attachment (id=19858)
Team UI plugiun with fix
